sentences.sContent: If you must use descendant selectors, prefer child selectors, which at least only require evaluation of one additional node, not all the intermediate nodes up to an ancestor.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you must use descendant selectors, prefer child selectors, which at least only require evaluation of one additional node, not all the intermediate nodes up to an ancestor.
sentences.sCn: 如果您必须使用后代选择器，尽量使用子代选择器，这最少只需评估一个额外的节点，而非中间直至祖先的所有节点。

words.tran: 下降物；下降者；下行字母
下降；下去；下来；遗传；屈尊
除去…的气味；使…失去香味

trans.tranOther: someone who is related to a person who lived a long time ago, or to a family, group of people etc that existed in the past
